q: We choose outcomes as goals and treat processes as chores. A wiser approach is to set processes as goals and treat outcomes as by-products.
Freethinkers are those who are willing to use their minds without prejudice and without fearing to understand things that clash with their own customs, privileges, or beliefs.
You have to decide who you are and force the world to deal with you, not with its idea of you.
Without courage we cannot practice any other virtue with consistency. We canâ€™t be kind, true, merciful, generous, or honest.
Death twitches my ear. Live, he says, I am coming.
Mostly it is loss which teaches us about the worth of things.
The strongest man in the world is he who stands most alone.
Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer the negative elements in your life, don't sit at home and think about it. Go out and get busy!
I would much rather have men ask why I have no statue, than why I have one.
Always laugh when you can. It is cheap medicine.
If the path is crowded, differentiate. If the path is empty, validate.
